Blog.post: Black out! time is abt 10.15pm... while i was surfing the net... suddenly total darkness.... so scarely...i m alone at home... quickly i made a call to d... his house was not affected... so i went to look for my little tourch light... a very mini one that is always by my bedside... just in case.... then went to look for some candles... that mama kept in the storeroom... yes of all the places...inside the storeroom... using my barehands to search for those candles... finally managed to find them or else.... i lighted 1 candle, placed it inside a mug... easy for me to bring around... i walked to kitchen...looked out of the window... wow...terrible traffic jam... streets with no lights...so dark... Mama walked up the stairs with some moonlight... helping her....almost breathless she said... my room was hot & stuffy...i worried that my fish will die... luckily the power was restored at abt 12am.... time to go to bed... got to work... kind of fun...the last experience was more than 10yrs ago... mood: white (='.'=)

Still feeling abit sick 2day... went to work, feeling blur for whole day... didnt talk much during work... surprised...cos dun bother to talk much... my head is killing me softly... i went home early...6.20pm... hoping to get some rest... but seems like the nite is short... almost 9pm already.... mood: purple (='x'=)
On MC 2day... still feeling giddy... going to bed soon... hope that i will be ok 2molo... hate this kind of feeling... so uneasy... Mood: purple (='x'=)
having headache... feeling giddy... duno y suddenly like that... Mood: Purple (='x'=)
urlLink took on sat @ Chinatown urlLink

Went to chinatown...which i normally dun like to go... went People's park to get some travel brochures... took some photos @ chinatown... went to the food center for dinner... the nite bazaar..so crowded... take NEL back to Hg station... Supper time! Yummy! Hot plate black pepper chicken! cost me $14 for 2 plates... 1 for moi & 1 for d... caught in the rain while walking back home... abit wet & cold...fun! i think i ate too much 2day... oops...time to do some workout... or else.... mood: yellow (='o'=)

wanted to go to MNG sales during lunch time... but guess wat? so damn crowded... the q was so long.... :( so my colleague & i decided not to q... haiz...save $...hahaha suppose to meet d for dinner... but he was too busy... work & more work... so went to buy dinner then go back... to watch ch 55... they are showing "wei si li" @ 8pm... where to enjoy myself 2molo?? any ideas? mood: white (='.'=)

Yes! 2molo is Friday! My long waited day... Thinking of where to go this sat.. Dont you agree that SG is too small... Nothing much for me to hang out... Same old places... Thinking of going to JB... Shop & eat...Cheap food... Very tasty too... But i cant go this weekend... Cos i m broke...end of the month... Trying to save some $$ for shopping... Hope July will be a better month than June... Mood: White (='.'=)
urlLink Fake Tattoo - Phuket urlLink

Seems like i cant go on leave... Kinda of tired of working life... Wish that i can stop working for a while... Travel around the world in 80 days! :p Dreaming again...where got $$?? Work so hard...Earn so little... Mood: Brown (='~'=)
My birthday is here.... No celebrations... Just a simple chicken curry dinner... No presents or cake too... Mood: White (='.'=)
urlLink NEL Tunnel urlLink

my 1st blog.... sunday = Rest day for me nothing much going on... TV..PC..TV..EAT...Sleep.. I m on leave 2molo... :) y? cos is my impt day of the yr... no, i m not getting married... is my "Birday"... Yes,i will be officially 27 2molo... Kind of scare... getting old... Mood: white (='.'=)
urlLink A lazy pig! urlLink
urlLink Roo!... urlLink
urlLink hairy! urlLink
urlLink my lunch..yummy! urlLink
urlLink 3 wooden figures urlLink

Me & Bro went to chomp chomp food centre for dinner just now... ordered quite a few nice food... esp the BBQ stingy Ray $8 only... cheap, fresh & nice!! the stall name is "Boon Tat" guilty & sinful dinner again...haiz... I m going to ZOO later... With mama, aunty & cousin... 1st trip with them... been to the zoo quite a few times already... very sleepy now...but still have to stay awake... i hope that i my wish for a good *** will be here soon... wish me luck! okie? keep my fingers XXX.... mood: white (='.'=)

getting bored nowadays... frds are going travelling... while i m broke so have to stay here... i want $$$.... working life is still the same... still no luck... Greece won Euro 04... surprising... mood: white (='.'=)

~friday~ Met d's frds after work... Kel,Lay,HL for dinner @ Lau Pa Sat... kel was talking abt his life over @UK... we chatted for about 2hrs plus... ~Sat~ went to Simei...pet safari... wow...the puppies are so cute... i cant wait to own one... after that went to tampines central... bought 2 pairs of shoes... had dinner @ cafe cartel... ordered ribs & pasta & ice-cream... we share all these food... went to NTUC...bought some food going to prepare my own breakfast 2molo... American style...hehehe.... Mood: yellow (='o'=)

busy for the whole day 2day... dun even have the time to go ladies... have a quick lunch then walk for awhile... went to cheers to get a can of soft drink... i can't believe Holland will lose the match... the oranges are gone....this yr euro 2004, sucks! agree? all the "dark horse" win... today i think Greece will lose... :p they are very lucky to get into the semi... but the ball is round...maybe they will win... lets find out after 4.30am Sat is coming...this sat will be going shopping... my fav past time... the GSS is going to end soon... better hurry...get some bargain stuff... mood: brown (='~'=)

2day is the lunar 7th mth..or we called it hungry ghost festival... i m not working today.... got an appt 2day @ 4pm.... went to D's working place after my appt @ ubi... wow..damn messy! hahaha...guys will be guys... but ok lah...at least got a own place...be own boss... having slight headache now... going to sleep soon... working 2molo... mood: white (=' . '=)

i m sick..for almost a week cough..flu...sore throat and fever.... finally sore throat, fever are gone... left with cough & flu...hopefully by weekend all will be cleared... planning to have fun over the next 3 days! i m on leave on 10th...yes! a very long weekend for me... but my greatest hope now is to get....... mood: purple (='+'=)

It has been a long time since my last update... well..nothing much to say about my current life... I bought Jay's latest ablum yesterday... " Qi Li Xiang " Not bad..same style as his previous ablums... National Day is coming...This yr i m going to stadium... able to catch the fireworks... i want to take a few shots on it... Mood: purple (=' x '=)
